3.title: Racetrack
3.content:
Racetrack -> Origami

Always wanted a stable & performant quick plug & play flexible & portable flat php Framework Library reflecting current client / boss needs ? Goals : Getting the job done, Asap, Free much time as possible .. provide wrappers and debugging for improved development speed and maintenance, failsafes, portable, plug & play. Deploy fast to config websites within 10 minutes pGit projet homepage : https://github.com/Ben749/racetrack

4.title: Helix Nebulae
4.content:
Helix Nebula, also known as NGC7293, also refered as "eye of god" or "eye of sauron", is a planetary Nebula located in the aquarius conselation. 700 light-years away, discovered in 1824 by Karl Ludwig Harding it is very similar in appearance to cat eye and ring's nebulaes.

sources : wikipedia : https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Helix_Nebula , http://tylercreatesworlds.deviantart.com/art/Eye-for-an-Eye-363414225
